name: com.lt2333.simplicitytools

releases.description:
- [新增] 隐藏NFC图标 (@YuKongA)
- [新增] 显示 WIFI 标准 (@YuKongA)
- [修复] 新版手机管家显示电池温度异常 (@GSWXXN)
- [修复] 隐藏网速单位 (@GSWXXN)
- [修复] 公测版控制中心天气异常 
- [其他] 更新Blockmiui至上游版本 

---
- [New] Hide NFC icon (@GSWXXN)
- [New] Show WIFI standard (@YuKongA)
- [Fix] The new version of the SecurityCenter shows the battery temperature abnormal (@GSWXXN)
- [Fix] Hide Network speed unit (@YuKongA)
- [Fix] The weather is abnormal in the public beta version of the control center
- [Other] Update Blockmiui to the upstream version
releases.descriptionHTML:
• [新增] 隐藏NFC图标 (@YuKongA)
  • [新增] 显示 WIFI 标准 (@YuKongA)
  • [修复] 新版手机管家显示电池温度异常 (@GSWXXN)
  • [修复] 隐藏网速单位 (@GSWXXN)
  • [修复] 公测版控制中心天气异常
  • [其他] 更新Blockmiui至上游版本
  • [New] Hide NFC icon (@GSWXXN)
  • [New] Show WIFI standard (@YuKongA)
  • [Fix] The new version of the SecurityCenter shows the battery temperature abnormal (@GSWXXN)
  • [Fix] Hide Network speed unit (@YuKongA)
  • [Fix] The weather is abnormal in the public beta version of the control center
  • [Other] Update Blockmiui to the upstream version

releases.description:
- [新增] 允许大多数应用通知下拉展开小窗 (@YifePlayte)
- [修复] 重启作用域后闪退的问题
- [优化] 使用EzXHelper重构所有Hook方法
- [其他] 升级依赖

---

- [New] Allow most applications to notify the drop-to-small window (@YifPlayte)
- [Fix] The problem of retreating after restarting the scope
- [Optimized] Use EzXHelper to reconstruct all hook methods
- [Other] Upgrade dependencies
releases.descriptionHTML:
• [新增] 允许大多数应用通知下拉展开小窗 (@YifePlayte)
  • [修复] 重启作用域后闪退的问题
  • [优化] 使用EzXHelper重构所有Hook方法
  • [其他] 升级依赖
  • [New] Allow most applications to notify the drop-to-small window (@YifPlayte)
  • [Fix] The problem of retreating after restarting the scope
  • [Optimized] Use EzXHelper to reconstruct all hook methods
  • [Other] Upgrade dependencies

releases.description:

- [修复] 小米11Ultra背屏天气显示异常

- [Fix] 11ULTRA rear screen weather display abnormal

releases.description:

- [新增] 11Ultra背屏显示天气

---

- [New] Custom mobile type text
- [New] 11Ultra rear screen weather display
- [New] CorePatch enhancement mode
- [Optimize] Subdivision of  CorePatch

  • [新增] 11Ultra背屏显示天气

releases.description:
- [新增] 自定义状态栏通知点数最大数量
- [修复] 部分机型时间居中+图标居左横屏FC
- [修复] 一处小问题

---

- [New] Custom Maximum number of Status Bar notification dots
- [Fix] Some devices turn on the clock center + icon left layout, and the horizontal screen FC
- [Fix] a small bug
releases.descriptionHTML:
• [新增] 自定义状态栏通知点数最大数量
  • [修复] 部分机型时间居中+图标居左横屏FC
  • [修复] 一处小问题
  • [New] Custom Maximum number of Status Bar notification dots
  • [Fix] Some devices turn on the clock center + icon left layout, and the horizontal screen FC
  • [Fix] a small bug

releases.description:
- [新增] 状态栏 时钟居右 布局
- [新增] 状态栏 时钟居中+图标居左 布局
- [新增] 自定义状态栏通知图标最大个数
- [修复] 开启时钟居中对齐后上移的问题

---

- [New] Status Bar Clock Right Layout
- [New] Status Bar Clock Center and Icon Left Layout
- [New] Custom Status Bar Notification Icon Maximum Number
- [Fix] After the clock is center aligned, the position moves upwards.
releases.descriptionHTML:
• [新增] 状态栏 时钟居右 布局
  • [新增] 状态栏 时钟居中+图标居左 布局
  • [新增] 自定义状态栏通知图标最大个数
  • [修复] 开启时钟居中对齐后上移的问题
  • [New] Status Bar Clock Right Layout
  • [New] Status Bar Clock Center and Icon Left Layout
  • [New] Custom Status Bar Notification Icon Maximum Number
  • [Fix] After the clock is center aligned, the position moves upwards.

releases.description:
- [新增] 强制允许所有应用接力 (@YifePlayte)
- [新增] 双排时钟支持居中对齐
- [修复] 最新内测版开启状态栏居中布局后，通知图标显示异常
- [优化] 使用EzXHepler (@qqlittleice233)
- [优化] 删除冗余代码

---

- [New] Force all apps support open on another device (@Yifeplayte)
- [New] dual row clock support center align
- [Fix] Latest Internal Test Edition MIUI, turn on the status bar center layout, the notification icon shows exception
- [Optimize] Use EzXHelper (@qqlittleic233)
- [Optimize] Delete redundant code
releases.descriptionHTML:
• [新增] 强制允许所有应用接力 (@YifePlayte)
  • [新增] 双排时钟支持居中对齐
  • [修复] 最新内测版开启状态栏居中布局后，通知图标显示异常
  • [优化] 使用EzXHepler (@qqlittleice233)
  • [优化] 删除冗余代码
  • [New] Force all apps support open on another device (@YifePlayte)
  • [New] dual row clock support center align
  • [Fix] Latest Internal Test Edition MIUI, turn on the status bar center layout, the notification icon shows exception
  • [Optimize] Use EzXHelper (@qqlittleic233)
  • [Optimize] Delete redundant code

releases.description:
- [新增] 大移动类型图标加粗开关
- [新增] 大移动类型图标大小调节
- [新增] 大移动类型图标上下位置调节
- [新增] 大移动类型图标左右边距调节
- [新增] 电池电量百分比字体大小调节
- [修复] 双排时钟后，下拉时钟大小异常
- [修复] 自定义时钟部分情况下不生效的问题
- [修复] 开机时的一处报错 

---

- [New] big mobile type icon bold switch
- [New] Big Mobile Type Icon Size adjustment
- [New] Big Mobile Type icon Up and Down position adjustment
- [New] Big Mobile Type Icon Left and Right margins adjustment
- [New] Battery percentage font size adjustment
- [Fix] After opening the dual row clock, the control center clock size is abnormal
- [Fix] Problem in the case of custom clock
- [Fix] An error log occurred at the time of boot
releases.descriptionHTML:
• [新增] 大移动类型图标加粗开关
  • [新增] 大移动类型图标大小调节
  • [新增] 大移动类型图标上下位置调节
  • [新增] 大移动类型图标左右边距调节
  • [新增] 电池电量百分比字体大小调节
  • [修复] 双排时钟后，下拉时钟大小异常
  • [修复] 自定义时钟部分情况下不生效的问题
  • [修复] 开机时的一处报错
  • [New] big mobile type icon bold switch
  • [New] Big Mobile Type Icon Size adjustment
  • [New] Big Mobile Type icon Up and Down position adjustment
  • [New] Big Mobile Type Icon Left and Right margins adjustment
  • [New] Battery percentage font size adjustment
  • [Fix] After opening the dual row clock, the control center clock size is abnormal
  • [Fix] Problem in the case of custom clock
  • [Fix] An error log occurred at the time of boot

releases.description:

releases.description:
- [新增] 双排网速组件
- [新增] 自定义双排网速图标
- [新增] 自定义双排网速大小
- [优化] 双排时钟组件，大小最大值调整至9

---

- [New] Dual Row Network Speed Display
- [New] Custom Dual Row Network Speed Icon
- [New] Custom Dual Row Network Speed Size
- [Optimize] Dual row clock view, size maximum adjustment to 9
releases.descriptionHTML:
• [新增] 双排网速组件

  • [新增] 自定义双排网速大小

  • [New] Custom Dual Row Network Speed Size

releases.description:
- [新增] 旧版快速设置行列自定义
- [修复] MIUI22.3.14之后解除截屏裁切限制失效

---

- [New] Old Quick Settings rows and columns custom
- [Bug fix] After the MIUI22.3.14 version, Remove screenshot crop restriction failure

readme:
WooBox For MIUI

English 丨 简体中文

一个基于 MIUI13（Android12）适配的系统拓展Xposed模块

--- ### 模块说明 仅支持MIUI13（Android12），其余版本无法使用。 开发者：[酷安@乌堆小透明](http://www.coolapk.com/u/883441) --- ### 模块截图 ![截图](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/LittleTurtle2333/SimplicityTools/main/doc/cn.jpg) --- ### 下载地址 Xposed仓库下载：[点击此处下载最新发行版](https://github.com/Xposed-Modules-Repo/com.lt2333.simplicitytools/releases) 酷安下载：[点击此处下载最新发行版](https://www.coolapk.com/apk/com.lt2333.simplicitytools) --- ### 改进翻译 [![Crowdin](https://badges.crowdin.net/simplicitytools/localized.svg)](https://crowdin.com/project/simplicitytools)[点击此处进入Crowdin](https://crowdin.com/project/simplicitytools) --- ### 第三方开源引用 ##### GNU General Public License v3.0 [qqlittleice/MiuiHome](https://github.com/qqlittleice/MiuiHome) [yujincheng08/BiliRoaming](https://github.com/yujincheng08/BiliRoaming) [Mikanoshi/CustoMIUIzer](https://code.highspec.ru/Mikanoshi/CustoMIUIzer) ##### GNU General Public License v2.0 [LSPosed/CorePatch](https://github.com/LSPosed/CorePatch) ##### GNU Lesser General Public License v2.1 [577fkj/blockmiui](https://github.com/577fkj/blockmiui) ##### Apache License 2.0 [KyuubiRan/EzXHelper](https://github.com/KyuubiRan/EzXHelper) --- ### License [GNU General Public License v3.0](https://github.com/LittleTurtle2333/SimplicityTools/blob/main/LICENSE)

summary:
原Simplicity Tools  
一个基于 MIUI13（Android12）适配的系统拓展Xposed模块 // A system extension Xposed module based on MIUI13 (Android12)
